name: BOneNextVoiceAct
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn on switch”
”Alexa, dim lights to 50%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
B.One Next is the smart home skill from Blaze Automation Inc. that gives you the ability to control smart devices added to B.One Next through voice commands.

Here is what you need to do:

1. Download the B.One Next mobile application and add all the smart devices to the app.

2. Open Amazon Alexa app and enable “B.One Next VoiceAct” skill.

3 Sign in with your B.One Next account.

4. When Alexa and B.One Next are successfully linked, press the “Discover Devices” button to discover all devices.
